articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at 00:00 on Monday, the greatest memorial day of the nation. 
					 He entered the hall where the statues of the Generalissimos are standing.
					
					 Laid before the statues were a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also placed before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with his companions, paid high tribute to the Generalissimos before the statues.
					
					 Then he entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state with the companions to make a bow to him in humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the room preserving the orders Kim Il Sung received, the mourning hall and halls that house a train and a car he used in his lifetime.
					
					 He then entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state to make a bow to him in humblest reverence together with the companions.
					
					 He went round the room preserving the orders Kim Jong Il received and halls that house a car, tramcar, boat and train he used in his lifetime.
					
					 He was accompanied by senior officials of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Korean People's Army including Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae, Choe Pu Il, Ju Kyu Chang and Kim Kyong Ok.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju visited the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex where he learned about the operation of the small furnace shop and furnace No. 1 and encouraged the workers engaged in tapping work. He underscored the need to carry forward the working spirit displayed by the preceding generations who built 100-ton open furnace by their own efforts and technology in a matter of less than one year from scratch after the war and produced molten iron.
					 Looking round the briquette and steel sheet shops, he acquainted himself with briquette moulding and production capability and the issues arising in combining science and technology with production.
					
					 A consultative meeting of officials concerned was held on the spot.
					
					 The meeting discussed the measures to increase steel production by relying on the production foundation provided under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and put the briquette moulding on a scientific basis.
					
					 Measures were taken to supply raw material and fuel to follow the maintenance of revolving furnace and successfully ensure conditions of scientific researches of scientists and technicians.
					
					 The premier called upon the workers of the complex to bear in mind the behests of Kim Il Sung who said iron and the machine are the king of industry, conduct a dynamic drive to create the "Masikryong Speed", increase production and thus respond with increased production of steel to the plan of the dear respected Kim Jong Un on building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Special Adviser to UN Secretary General Visits Various Places
articles.content:
Special Adviser to UN Secretary General Visits Various Places
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Wilfried Lemke, special adviser to the Secretary General of the United Nations on Sports for Development and Peace, and his companion Monday visited the construction site of the ski resort on Masik Pass.
					 They looked round the People's Open-air Ice Rink, Skate Park, Rungna People's Sports Park, Pyongyang International Football School and the Yanggakdo Sports Village.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the party and state, chairperson of a friendly party and officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the greatest memorial day of the nation, to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Seen standing before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also placed before them was a floral basket in the name of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the SPA and the Cabinet of the DPRK was laid before them.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos who put the country on the status of an invincible political and ideological power, world-class military power and full-fledged nuclear weapons state and provided an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the generations to come with their outstanding idea and through their energetic leadership.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the rooms preserving the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and visits to foreign countries till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the consulates general of China and Russia in Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province and delegations from Jilin Province, China visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung in the city, and his statue standing in front of the Monument to Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province on Monday, the 19th anniversary of his demise.
					 The guests laid floral baskets and bouquets before his statues and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Foreigners and Chinese residents in Chongjin City also paid floral tribute to his statue on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Floral tribute was paid to statues of President Kim Il Sung in different parts of the country on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of his demise. 
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid highest tribute to them. 
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions at all levels, industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang, as well as bouquets and flowers.
					
					  A floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front was also laid before the statues.
					
					 The visitors made bows towards the statues with boundless reverence for the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu who performed immortal feats before the country and its people, the era and history.
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues of the Generalissimos and portraits of the smiling leaders in different parts of Pyongyang.
					
					 Service personnel and working people in various parts of the country and school youth and children visited the statues of the President and portraits of the smiling leader in their residential areas and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Plaza of Kumsusan Palace of Sun Crowded with Visitors
articles.content:
Plaza of Kumsusan Palace of Sun Crowded with Visitors
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel, people from all walks of life and youth and students visited the park in the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Monday, the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They made bows towards portraits of the smiling great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who performed immortal feats for the country and the revolution, the era and history and provided an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the generations to come with their outstanding idea and through their energetic leadership.
					
					 They looked round lawns, flower gardens, fountains and resting places.
					
					 Service personnel, officials of ministries and national institutions, people from all walks of life and youth and students recollected with deep emotion those days when they displayed intense loyalty to the work to spruce up the park into the best one, true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They had pictures taken in the picturesque park of the plaza.
					
					 Meanwhile, overseas compatriots and foreign guests also visited the park on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of different countries, representatives of international organizations and the military attaches corps here visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Monday, the 19th anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to developing the friendly relations among countries and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 They entered the halls where the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them.
					
					 They went round the rooms preserving the orders the Generalissimos received and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches they used for field guidance and foreign visits in the last period of their lives.
					
					 On the same day the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, Jong Il Sim, Korean resident in Russia, a delegation of Korean youth and students in Japan led by Kim Tu Sop, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, overseas compatriots and foreign guests paid tribute to the Generalissimos.

articles.title: Concert Given to Remember Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Concert Given to Remember Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A remembrance concert "The Leader Will Always Be with Us" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre Monday, the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the audience were senior officials of the party, state and army including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae, a chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Among those present on invitation were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas Koreans, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of various countries and representatives of international organizations here and their wives.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers including male solo "Our Leader", string ensemble "The Leader Has Come to Our Post" and female solo "Our Happiness Blossoms Out under the Leader's Loving Care".
					
					 Performers praised Kim Il Sung for liberating the country through protracted bloody battles and building the socialist power on this land.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by the numbers which made them  look back upon the revolutionary career of the President in which he provided field guidance to every nook and corner of the country, believing in the people as in Heaven and finding his pleasure in the people's happiness.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Il Sung Represent Deep Reverence for Him
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Il Sung Represent Deep Reverence for Him
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was presented with a great number of gifts from different countries even after his demise (July 8, 1994). 
					 Those gifts, on display at the hall of immortality in the International Friendship Exhibition House, show the growing reverence of the world progressives for the President.
					
					 Among them is a gift presented in the name of the Chinese party and government. It is a wax replica depicting Kim Il Sung standing on the shore of Lake Samji against the background of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 A gift presented by a Nigerian tribal king includes throne, dress, baton, necklace and bracelet, which were belonging to the tribal chief of the sun.
					
					 There are also a metal print "Brave Champions of Freedom" sent by the chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh and "Trophy" by a Polish delegation for the study of the Juche idea. 
					
					 Fur craftwork "Sun" given by National University of Callao in Peru in 2002 represents profound reverence for Kim Il Sung, who is praised as the sun of mankind.
					
					 The exhibits also include a crystal ware "Portrait of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and a metal sculpture "Tower to Immortality". 
					
					 All of the gifts give a glimpse of the ardent yearning cherished by the world's progressives for Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Optimistic Life Characterized by Songs
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Optimistic Life Characterized by Songs
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was a great sage who always lived an optimistic life under whatever circumstances.
					 It was his lifelong view of life that man should live and work in an optimistic way along with songs.
					
					 Once in his lifetime, he recalled that he overcame all sorts of trials at all stages of revolution, inspired by songs.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he personally wrote revolutionary works like "Sea of Blood", "The Flower Girl", "Blood at an International Conference", "The Fate of a Self-defence Corps Man", "The Mountain Shrine" and song "Nostalgia".
					
					 On the occasion of leader Kim Jong Il's 50th birthday, he composed a poem "Shining Star".
					
					 "Mt. Myohyang on an Autumn Day" is a lyric poem composed by him.
					
					 He recalled that he crossed the River Amnok, singing the "Song of the River Amnok", when he was 14 years old. At that time he made a grim resolve not to return before Korea became independent.
					
					 His favorite songs were "Revolutionary", "Nostalgia", "Song of Sea" and "Song of Chollima Forerunner".
					
					 It was well known that he sang the song "Nostalgia" at a dinner with heroes and model soldiers in June Juche 40 (1951).
					
					 He saw to it that revolutionary songs swept the whole of the country, as an impetus to registering fresh innovations in economic sectors and construction.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Peerlessly Great Man
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Peerlessly Great Man
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung, who was the pioneer of the revolutionary cause of Juche, founder of socialist Korea, gifted thinker-theoretician, prominent statesman, iron-willed commander and benevolent father of people.
					 Born on April 15, Juche 1 (1912), he devoted all his life to the freedom and wellbeing of people.
					
					 He founded the great Juche idea to let the working masses emerge masters of their own destinies and the times.
					
					 He declared an anti-Japanese war for the freedom and independence of Korea in his teens and defeated the Japanese imperialist aggressors in his thirties.
					
					 In the 1950s he led the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialist aggressors, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, to victory with his talented military idea, strategy and tactics and superb commanding art.
					
					 He founded the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea and the invincible revolutionary army and established the genuine people's power.
					
					 He turned the Democratic People's Republic of Korea into the homeland of Juche idea, a powerful state independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He advanced such just and reasonable policies for Korea's reunification as the Three Principles of National Reunification, the Proposal for Founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation.
					
					 In his lifetime he traveled long journeys to visit big and small countries in Asia, Africa and Europe in order to smash the imperialists' aggression and domination moves and establish a new world order through close unity of the oppressed people the world over.
					
					 He met more than 70,000 personages of different social strata of 136 countries, including party, state and government leaders.
					
					 Not only the Korean people but also world people call him peerlessly great man in recognition of his enormous feats.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Leads Korean War to Victory (1)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Leads Korean War to Victory (1)
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly brilliant commander who led the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) to victory with application of the unique military strategy and tactics.
					 The U.S. provoked a war against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on June 25, Juche 39 (1950), declaring that it would conclude the Korean War in 72 hours.
					
					 But, soon after the outbreak of the war, the Korean People's Army went over to counteroffensive and seized nearly whole territory of south Korea in a month, pushing back the provokers to the area south of the River Rakdong and taking the initiative in the war.
					
					 Kim Il Sung directed the counteroffensive to the area where the enemy troops were amassed and Seoul City.
					
					 Thanks to his superb tactics, Seoul was liberated three days after the start of the war.
					
					 Upset by it, the U.S. built up a defence line along the River Han with the south Korean puppet troops and began massively introducing its forces into the war.
					
					 To cope with the situation, Kim Il Sung saw to it that the KPA units further enhanced the offensive speed to stamp out the remnants of the puppet forces, thus laying hurdles to deployment of U.S. forces.
					
					 The KPA units completely annihilated the "Smith commandos", an advance unit of the U.S. 24th Infantry Division in Osan area and broke through the U.S. defence lines one after another.
					
					 KPA seamen sank the U.S. heavy cruiser "Baltimore" with attack of torpedo boats in the waters off Jumunjin several days after the outbreak of the war, while airmen downed "B-29" bombers and other latest warplanes.
					
					 Under the command of Kim Il Sung, the KPA liberated over 90 percent territory of south Korea, inhabited by more than 92 percent of its population, only in a month and a half.

articles.title: Software for Prevention of Flood Damage Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Software for Prevention of Flood Damage Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A software for prevention of flood damage has been developed by the IT Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 On the basis of overall survey and analysis of meteorological and hydrological data obtained in the basin of the River Taedong for scores of years, scientists of the institute set up three-dimensional geographical information system. The system confirmed all flooding locations across the country.
					
					 It was greatly conducive to reducing damage in flood-afflicted areas, including the estuary of the River Amnok and the basin of the River Chongchon.
					
					 The DPRK government gave commendation to the scientists who developed the software.

articles.title: Construction of Ski Resort on Masik Pass Makes Brisk Headway
articles.content:
Construction of Ski Resort on Masik Pass Makes Brisk Headway
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The overall work in the construction site of the ski resort on Masik Pass made progress two times as fast in the last month as that in the previous month thanks to the high-pitched drive of the soldier-builders there.
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the construction site after initiating the construction of the world's best ski resort and assigning it to the KPA. He made public an appeal, encouraging the solider-builders to bring about miracles and leap forward.
					
					 The deep trust and care shown by him for them were the main source of strength that encouraged them to display the spirit of "At a go" in the construction site.
					
					 Thanks to the spirit of devotedly carrying out their tasks and indomitable spirit displayed by the soldier-builders, the laying out of 10 skiing courses has been wound up.
					
					 The project for widening roads, the construction of houses for dozens of families, etc. are progressing at a final phase.
					
					 The construction of an underground parking lot, hotel and dozens of other structures is also making rapid progress. 
					
					 The soldier-builders wrought miracles in concrete tamping on pillars and floor block in the construction of the underground parking lot and other projects by introducing advanced construction methods with the same vim and vigor with which they pushed ahead with the project on Taehwa Peak.
					
					 They finished the construction of the structure of a bridge leading to a building in a matter of just five days.
					
					 The groundwork was completed in a short span of time in the construction site of the hotel to kick off a ground structure project. The construction of service and lodging quarters is also making brisk headway.
					
					 A project for reservoir excavation was finished and the plan for the construction of gate post of the ski resort, cableway control room, etc. was carried out more than 50 percent.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Idea and Exploits Praised by Press Here
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Idea and Exploits Praised by Press Here
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Papers today here dedicate editorials to the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Papers stress that the President was the peerless patriot, prominent elder statesman and father of socialist Korea who achieved undying feats before the country, people, era and revolution with his profound ideology and theory, rare leadership ability and gigantic revolutionary practice.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that his idea and exploits serve as the driving power helping the DPRK dignified with independence make a dynamic advance along the road of prosperity, demonstrating its might by dint of Songun.
					
					 The paper notes that the Juche idea founded and successfully applied by him in the revolutionary practice is the eternal banner of victory of the Korean revolution, and Songun revolutionary exploits achieved by him is the basic foundation enabling the country to make a long drive as a matchless military power. It goes on:
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, a legacy left by him out of patriotism, is the permanent cornerstone for the country's prosperity and the foundation for the eternal happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 The greatest exploit made by him for the country and revolution is that he provided a sure guarantee for successfully carrying forward and completing the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that very bright and rosy is the future of the Korean revolution which advances under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, holding the President and leader Kim Jong Il as the sun of Juche and Songun in high esteem.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for Cause
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for Cause
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The feats performed by President Kim Il Sung will be praised along with the development of the human cause of independence, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The President's whole life was a patriotic one dedicated to the eternal prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, and the sacred one for global independence.
					
					 The President was the sun and savior of humankind who put forward the popular masses as the master of the history and their own destinies by founding the immortal Juche idea, the guiding idea of the era of independence, the new era of the history.
					
					 He set an example of the struggle for the national liberation and class liberation based on the Juche idea and made an immortal contribution to the human cause of independence by theoretically formulating it.
					
					 He regarded it as his lifetime motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, devoted everything to their happiness and built the socialist paradise centered on the popular masses on this land, thus providing the progressives struggling for independence with coordinates of their life and struggle.
					
					 The Korean people could become the most dignified and proud people in the world as he built the socialist paradise centered on the popular masses on this land.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is an ideal land craved by humankind.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lays Bare Illegality of "UN Command"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for Cause
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The feats performed by President Kim Il Sung will be praised along with the development of the human cause of independence, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The President's whole life was a patriotic one dedicated to the eternal prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, and the sacred one for global independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Forces' Reckless Suppression Flayed
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lays Bare Illegality of "UN Command"
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK permanent representative at the UN on June 21 clarified the stand of the DPRK government for the dismantlement of the "UN Command", a ghost mechanism which does not exist in actuality.
					 Minju Joson Monday in a bylined commentary says this has elicited understanding and sympathy from broad international community as it is a just demand that took into due consideration the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula and the composition and operation of the command.
					
					 The command is ghost mechanism which the U.S. illegally fabricated in a bid to draw troops of its satellites into invasion of the DPRK during the Korean war in the 1950s, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 No troops of these satellites can now be found in the command.
					
					 In fact, the U.S. is the only country that remains in the command under the helmet of the "UN Forces". Strange is that the command is confronting UN member nations now that the DPRK has become a UN member nation and China, one signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement, a permanent member nation of the UN Security Council. That is why the UN itself was compelled to admit that the command does not represent the UN.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. justify its hostile policy toward the DPRK as it is resorting to the moves for stifling the DPRK by force of arms by abusing the name of the UN.
					
					 The U.S. should respond to the just demand of the DPRK, bearing in mind that it can never evade the blame for wrecking peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: March for Conclusion of Peace Treaty on Peninsula Starts in S. Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Forces' Reckless Suppression Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea held a press conference outside the Seoul District Police Agency on July 5 in protest against the puppet forces' reckless suppression.
					 At the conference speakers accused the police authorities of conducting an investigation into e-mails of members of the organization.
					
					 This action taken by police against them without any ground is a human rights abuse, they charged.
					
					 Most of those members subject to investigation took part in the recent rally held in protest against the Intelligence Service's interference in the "presidential election", they said, slamming the IS for working hard to cover up its crimes through crackdown upon progressive forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Turning Down Demand of Workers
articles.content:
March for Conclusion of Peace Treaty on Peninsula Starts in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korean started a grand march for the conclusion of a peace treaty on the Korean Peninsula on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					 Members of the march group held a press conference before the front gate to the project site of the naval base in Kangjong Village, Sogwipho City, Jeju Province on Thursday.
					
					 They held that in order to totally prevent a war on this land it is necessary to conclude a peace treaty without fail.
					
					 All the Koreans have lived over the 60 years since the ceasefire, longing for peace, they said.
					
					 They declared they would go round places still bearing war wounds including Jeju Island, Mt. Jiri and Rogun-ri, Yongdong County, North Chungchong Province and build up the public opinion over the urgency of peace.
					
					 They marched in Sogwipho City, chanting slogans "Put an end to the armistice mechanism and conclude a peace treaty!", "We will not live in uneasiness, Conclude a peace treaty!" and "Let Us Defend Kangjong Village!"

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Respect Spirit of July 4 Joint Statement
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Turning Down Demand of Workers
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on July 5 released a commentary accusing the puppet authorities of their policy turning down the demand of workers for wage hike.
					 Recalling that the authorities took a step for "raising" wages of workers next year, the commentary said:
					
					 It is needless to say that the wage hike can not ensure the minimum living cost of workers. It is doubtful that the step would help narrow down the world's worst income gap in south Korea.
					
					 The commentary declared that the organization would take the lead in the actions for the improvement of the system for providing the workers with a substantial life.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Respect Spirit of July 4 Joint Statement
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference in Kwangju on July 4 at which it demanded the puppet authorities respect the spirit of the July 4 joint statement.
					 At the conference speakers recalled 41 years have passed since the publication of the July 4 joint statement the keynote of which is the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.
					
					 The spirit of the joint statement has been carried forward and developed into the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration despite the vicious moves of the separatist forces, they said.
					
					 Now is the time to give full play to the spirit of independence, peace and great national unity, they said, calling upon all those who  love the nation to turn out in the struggle for national reunification regardless of idea, political view and religious belief.
					
					 The Kaesong Industrial Zone is a product of the June 15 joint declaration, they said, urging the present "government" to opt for dialogue with the north without conditions, not blocking exchange and cooperation undertakings of NGOs.
					
					 They called for handing the era of peace and prosperity over to posterity by concluding a peace treaty on the Korean Peninsula this year marking the 60th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Seminars, reading sessions, exhibitions of books, photos and craftworks and film shows took place in Russia, Bangladesh, Cambodia, Nepal and Ethiopia on July 1 and 2 to commemorate the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 There were photos showing the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the venues of the events. 
					
					 On display there were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, books introducing Songun Korea and craftworks associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 People from all walks of life of relevant countries took part in the events. 
					
					 A vice mayor of Moscow said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into the political and military power and provided eternal foundation which would help it vigorously advance along the way of independence without any vacillation despite all the provocations by the imperialist allied forces. 
					
					 The general manager of the History and Art Centre in Dmitrov City, Moscow Region said progressive mankind sees future of victorious DPRK in the figure of Kim Jong Un who successfully carried out the cause of immortalizing the preceding leaders and has led the drive of the Korean people to build a thriving nation. 
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said Kim Il Sung was the prominent leader who created the immortal Juche idea, illuminating the way of the times and revolution. 
					
					 The general director of the Cambodian State Radio Broadcasting Station said Kim Il Sung was the great father of the Korean nation who made the DPRK the only country of single-minded unity after beating back the aggression by outside forces. 
					
					 Korean films including "Pyongyang at Night" were shown at the film shows.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Papers and radio services of various countries carried special write-ups and made special reports on July 2 to commemorate the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The paper of Democratic Congo L' Avenir carried various articles illustrated with a portrait of the  smiling President.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "The benevolent father of people" said Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution for the country and the people in his teens, founded the Juche idea and led the protracted and complicated Korean revolution to victory by depending on the tremendous strength of the popular masses.
					
					 The benevolent image of Kim Il Sung as the father of the people will always be remembered by the Korean people, it added.
					
					 The Indonesian paper Siputar Indonesia in an article titled "The life characterized by the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven" said:
					
					 The life of the President was the one characterized by his ardent love for the people and boundless devotion to them.
					
					 The President who dedicated his whole life to the people will always be remembered by the Korean people and the progressive humankind as the great leader and benevolent father.
					
					 The state radio broadcasting service and FM 90.5 radio of Cambodia reported that he put forward the Korean people as the master of the country and society with a firm political idea of believing in the people as in Heaven, adding: He dedicated his all to the people, regarding their happiness as his pleasure.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Talks Supported by Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The international community is growing in its voices praising President Kim Il Sung as the days go by.
					 Line of March, organ of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), noted Kim Il Sung firmly defended the independence and sovereignty of the country and made undying contribution to the world revolution by wisely leading the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle. He was the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea, father of socialist Korea and eternal President of the DPRK, it added.
					
					 The Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article posted on its website said the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung who dedicated his whole life to the accomplishment of independence of the popular masses greatly encouraged the oppressed people who were languishing, being subject to aggression and plunder by imperialism.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association said Kim Il Sung was the most prominent statesman in the 20th century who enjoyed absolute support and trust by the popular masses throughout his life for his outstanding idea, leadership ability and noble traits.
					
					 The chief of the Information Department of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy said Kim Il Sung was a great father of the people who devoted himself to the happiness of the people.
					
					 Noting people call Korea Kim Il Sung's Korea, a Senegalese paper said the DPRK is just the country which was built under his leadership.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean Victory in War Observed by Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Talks Supported by Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The paper of Democratic Congo L' Avenir on July 2 carried a commentary titled "The DPRK proposed the U.S. holding direct talks". It was illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The DPRK has been exposed to persistent threat and blackmail by the U.S. since the end of the Korean war in the 1950s. 
					
					 Such situation has increased the danger of a new war on the Korean Peninsula where the state of neither war nor peace prevails.
					
					 The purpose of the DPRK's proposal is to create an atmosphere favorable for the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The DPRK wishes for promoting free visits between the north and the south by bringing about detente and removing the barrier of division.
					
					 Now the ball is in the U.S. side. The U.S. should neither miss this opportunity nor employ double-dealing tactics.
					
					 It is contradiction that the U.S. keeps deploying a huge amount of nuclear missiles in south Korea and Japan while talking about "peace".
					
					 To the DPRK, south Korea and Japan are no more than puppets of the U.S. So the DPRK is of the view that true direct talks are possible only with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is sure of its proposal for peace.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Marked in Britain
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean Victory in War Observed by Foreign Political Parties
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Germany and Peru carried special write-ups in their organs to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The July issue of the Rote Fahne, organ of the Communist Party of Germany, carried an article titled "The Korean people's victory in the anti-U.S. struggle" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The Korean people won victory in the war with the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The DPRK has registered only victories in the history of ceaseless showdown with the U.S. since the armistice.
					
					 In 1993 the U.S. raised suspicion about the DPRK's development of nukes and attempted to make an "ad-hoc inspection" of it by instigating the IAEA and, at the same time, posed military threat to the DPRK by staging Team Spirit joint military drills.
					
					 At that time the DPRK declared that it would quit the NPT in response to it.
					
					 Such tough attitude dragged U.S. imperialism into talks and finally, the DPRK and the U.S. agreed to peacefully settle the Korean nuclear issue in June, 1993 which was followed by the adoption of the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework in October, 1994.
					
					 In the 2000s when Bush pinpointed the DPRK as part of an "axis of evil", the DPRK totally pulled out of the NPT and gave spurs to having an access to nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The U.S. and its satellite forces fabricated an unjust UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, taking issue with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes in December last.
					
					  The DPRK conducted an underground nuclear test as its physical measure to protect the country's sovereignty and security.
					
					 Only victories have been recorded for the DPRK while only defeats for the U.S. imperialists in the history of DPRK-U.S. showdown.
					
					 The July issue of the organ of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru carried an article introducing the battle to liberate Taejon City during the Fatherland Liberation War. It was illustrated with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un making a speech at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la 0 del dia 8, dia de recordacion nacional, el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, donde  estan conservados los cuerpos de los grandes Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y les rindieron el postumo homenaje.
					Ante sus estatuas de pie en el hall quedaron depositados un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro en nombre de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					
					El Mariscal, junto con los participantes, expreso sublime homenaje ante sus estatuas de pie y sus cuerpos en los salones de eternidad, respectivamente.
					
					Luego, recorrio las salas de conservacion de ordenes de los Generalisimos, el hall de llantos, las  de conservacion de vagones de tren y carros, coche electrico, barco y tren usados por ellos. 
					
					Le acompanaron Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae, Choe Pu Il, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Kyong Ok, los miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y del CDN de la RPDC y otros integrantes directivos del EPC.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre fabricas y empresas de la zona de Sunchon
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre fabricas y empresas de la zona de Sunchon
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno el estado de produccion del Complejo de Cemento, el Complejo Quimico y la Fabrica de Abono Nitrogenado y Calcico, de Sunchon.
					En el primer destino, Pak convoco una reunion consultiva tras hacer conocimiento del estado de produccion de cemento.
					
					La reunion subrayo la necesidad de aprender activamente el espiritu y el estilo de la lucha de los constructores militares del monte Masik quienes en acato a la orden del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, crean una nueva velocidad de gran salto.
					
					Tomo las medidas para acelerar la modernizacion del proceso de produccion, reducir el plazo de la reparacion de hornos e incrementar considerablemente la produccion a fin de enviar gran cantidad de cemento a los importantes lugares de construccion.
					
					Tambien, en los demas destinos, Pak examino concretamente el estado de produccion y realizo una reunion consultiva.
					
					Senalo que el Consejo de Ministros y las unidades correspondientes deben suministrar a tiempo las materias primas y materiales necesarios a la produccion de vinalon y abonos y que los funcionarios y otros obreros de las unidades concernientes deben impulsar con vigor la modernizacion de las instalaciones para que normalicen la produccion.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno las gestiones del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae. 
					Tras hacer conocimiento del estado de operacion del taller de alto horno de pequeno tamano y del alto horno no. 1, estimulo a los obreros realizando la colada y les llamo a continuar el espiritu de lucha de las generaciones antecesoras que en menos de un ano despues de terminada la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), edificaron con fuerzas y tecnicas propias el horno Martin de 100 toneladas y posibilitaron la produccion de hierro fundido. 
					
					Paso revista al taller de briqueta oval y otros procesos cerciorandose del moldeado y capacidad productiva de la briqueta oval y de los problemas que se presentan en combinar la ciencia y tecnica con la produccion. 
					
					Convoco en el mismo terreno la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios interesados. 
					
					Se debatieron en la ocasion los remedios para aumentar la produccion de acero ateniendose a la base de produccion preparada por la orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y elevar el nivel cientifico del moldeado de briqueta oval. 
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para suministrar a tiempo las materias primas y combustibles tan pronto como termine el mantenimiento del horno giratorio y facilitar suficientes condiciones de investigacion a los cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Pak senalo que la clase obrera del complejo debe apoyar con el incremento de acero al proyecto del Mariscal Kim Jong Un sobre la construccion del Estado prospero al producir una fuerte campana para crear la "velocidad Masikryong" y promover la produccion teniendo siempre presente el legado del Presidente de que el hierro y la maquina son rey de la industria.

articles.title: Wilfried Lemke y su comitiva recorren varios puntos de RPDC
articles.content:
Wilfried Lemke y su comitiva recorren varios puntos de RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Wilfried Lemke, asesor especial del secretario general de la ONU encargado de deporte para el desarrollo y la paz, y su comitiva recorrieron el dia 8 el lugar de construccion del campo de esqui del monte Masik.
					Tambien, los huespedes estuvieron en el  Centro de Patinaje al Aire Libre del Pueblo, el patinadero de ruedas, el Parque Deportivo del Pueblo de Rungna, la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang y la villa deportiva en el islote Yanggak.

articles.title: Cuadros del partido y Estado rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido y Estado rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de gran duelo nacional, los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales rindieron el dia 8 el homenaje postumo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan. 
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los dos Generalisimos se veian un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el otro a nombre de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el CDN de la RPDC. 
					
					Fue puesto un cesto de flores a nombre del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la APS y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					Los participantes expresaron sublime homenaje ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes Generalisimos quienes con su destacada idea y energica guia convirtieron la patria en la invencible potencia ideo-politica, la militar de talla mundial y en el digno pais con armas nucleares y asentaron la base de eterna duracion para la prosperidad nacional. 
					
					Y se dirigieron a los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados los cuerpos de los Generalisimos. 
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de ordenes de los Generalisimos, las de conservacion de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para las visitas de orientacion y los viajes al extranjero.
